00036 #define JOURNAL_HASH(J)                                                 \
00037   (crc32_update (crc32_buffer ((J)->name.str, (J)->name.len),           \
00038                  &(J)->oper, sizeof ((J)->oper)))
00039 
00041 typedef enum journal_operation_def
00042 {
00043   JOURNAL_OPERATION_ADD,                
00044   JOURNAL_OPERATION_DEL,                
00045   JOURNAL_OPERATION_LAST_AND_UNUSED
00046 } journal_operation_t;
00047 
00048 typedef struct journal_entry_def *journal_entry;
00049 
00051 struct journal_entry_def
00052 {
00053   journal_entry next;           
00054   journal_entry prev;           
00056   uint32_t dev;                 
00057   uint32_t ino;                 
00058   uint32_t gen;                 
00059   journal_operation_t oper;     
00060   string name;                  
00061   zfs_fh master_fh;             
00062   uint64_t master_version;      
00063 };
00064 
00066 typedef struct journal_def
00067 {
00069   htab_t htab;
00070 
00072   pthread_mutex_t *mutex;
00073 
00075   journal_entry first;
00076   journal_entry last;
00077 
00079   int fd;
00080 
00082   unsigned int generation;
00083 } *journal_t;

00085 extern journal_t journal_create (unsigned int nelem, pthread_mutex_t *mutex);
00086 extern void journal_empty (journal_t journal);
00087 extern void journal_destroy (journal_t journal);

00089                             zfs_fh *local_fh, zfs_fh *master_fh,
00090                             uint64_t master_version, string *name, bool copy);
00091 extern bool journal_member (journal_t journal, journal_operation_t oper,
00092                             string *name);
00093 extern bool journal_delete (journal_t journal, journal_operation_t oper,
00094                             string *name);

00096 extern void print_journal (FILE *f, journal_t journal);
